items.sentence: Tom and Mary always have a lot to tell each other because they lead such full lives.
According to the newspaper, the cost of living in Tokyo is the highest in the world.
The louder the music is, the more people drink because they spend less time talking.
My car was damaged in a hit-and-run accident in a supermarket parking lot yesterday.
My grammar may not be perfect, but people seem to understand what I'm trying to say.
